about_the_game:
ROCKET BILLY RED CADILLAC is back.

Electrify the enemies with the electric guitar BL20000V.

content_descriptors.notes: Gungrave G.O.R.E is a stylish third-person action shooter by South-Korean Studio IGGYMOB in which you take on the role of Grave, a gunslinger of resurrection and badass anti-hero of your dreams, mowing down tons of enemies in a gory ballet of bullets.

detailed_description:
ROCKET BILLY RED CADILLAC is back.

Electrify the enemies with the electric guitar BL20000V.
